title: How to level up in boards
body:
I'm guessing that the levels that you can get on the forums here are different/not connected to the levels that you are on the client, mainly because I'm level 5 on here and level 25 in the game. 
The issue is that every time I want to write on someone's board post or sometimes create one, I can't because my level isn't high enough. How can I level this up if I can't even write on most posts/create posts half the time? Does anyone know any way to make this quicker for me?

replies.body: They are connected, but it can just take a moment for your account to sync to your boards profile.  Your level looks to be showing 25 now!  Let me know if you run into any issues, though!
